subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Seventh-seeded Richard Gasquet recovered to beat Marc Gicquel, 4-6, 6-2, 6-2, in the first round of the Brisbane International tournament in Australia. The joint ATP-WTA tournament is being played for the first time at the new Queensland Tennis Centre. In other men’s matches, Taylor Dent beat Steve Darcis, 7-6 (7-0), 6-2, and will play Gasquet in the second round. Among first-round women’s matches, second-seeded Victoria Azarenka defeated Kateryna Bondarenko, 6-0, 6-2.
